mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profiles ( issuer, issuer_user_id, first_name, last_name, full_name, avatar, contact_email, email_verified, auth_id ) VALUES ( #{issuer}, #{issuer_user_id}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{full_name}, #{avatar}, #{contact_email}, #{email_verified}, #{auth_id} ) ON CONFLICT (auth_id) DO NOTHING;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE auth_id=(SELECT id FROM auth WHERE email=#{email})
SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE auth_id=(SELECT id FROM auth WHERE username=#{username})
